mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_mt_channel_config ( `channel_id`, `config_key`, `config_code`, `config_value1`, `config_value2`, `config_value3`, `comment`, `created`, `creater`, `modified`, `modifier`, `status`, `config_type` ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{configKey}, #{configCode}, #{configValue1}, #{configValue2}, #{configValue3}, #{comment}, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{creater} #{status}, #{configType} )
